COMBATTRACKEREXTENSIONS.MenuAddTooltip: Add tokens from canvas to encounter
COMBATTRACKEREXTENSIONS.InitiativeGroupC: This will remove all members from all existing groups. Groups will remain
This will remove all members from all existing groups and delete all groups.
This will remove all members from this group and delete the group.
Create group from token and join all combatants with this token to the created group. If group already exist, it will be updated.
Create group from actor and join all combatants with this actor to the created group. If group already exist, it will be updated.
Create group from actor folder and join all combatants with actors in the same folder to the created group. If group already exist, it will be updated.
Create group and join all Players combatants to the created group. If group already exist, it will be updated.
Create group and join all NPCs combatants to the created group. If group already exist, it will be updated.
Create group and join all Friendly NPCs combatants to the created group. If group already exist, it will be updated.
Create group and join all Neutral NPCs combatants to the created group. If group already exist, it will be updated.
Create group and join all Hostile NPCs combatants to the created group. If group already exist, it will be updated.
Create group and join all Secret NPCs combatants to the created group. If group already exist, it will be updated.

OBSCURING_OPTIONS.Name: Obscuring Options
OBSCURING_OPTIONS.Hint: Options for obscuring combatant information for players. Owned tokens are never obscured

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHARING_GROUPS_SHA.Name: Sharing Groups also share phase
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHARING_GROUPS_SHA.Hint: When checked, combatants in a group that shares inititative also share phase. Only used if [Enable combatants groups] is enabled

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_NEW_GROUPS_SHARES_.Name: New groups shares initiative
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_NEW_GROUPS_SHARES_.Hint: When checked, new groups will be created with Shared Initiative enabled as default. Only used if [Enable combatants groups] is enabled

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_PHASE_UNSET_NAME.Name: Unset phase name
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_PHASE_UNSET_NAME.Hint: The name(caption) to be shown for the Unset phase

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_PHASE_ASSIG.Name: Enable phase assignment random
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_PHASE_ASSIG.Hint: When checked, the Phase Assignment dropdown will have a entry for randomly selecting a unset combatant.

OPTION_CANVAS_TOKEN_HIDE_TOKEN_EFFECTS_F.Name: Hide token effects for non-GMs
OPTION_CANVAS_TOKEN_HIDE_TOKEN_EFFECTS_F.Hint: When checked, token active effects on the Canvas will only be showed for owned tokens.

OPTION_CANVAS_TOKEN_HIDE_TOKEN_BORDER_FO.Name: Hide token border for non-GMs
OPTION_CANVAS_TOKEN_HIDE_TOKEN_BORDER_FO.Hint: When checked, token border on the Canvas will only be showed for owned tokens.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_TOKEN_EFFECTS.Name: Hide combatant effects for non-GMs
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_TOKEN_EFFECTS.Hint: When checked, combatants active effects in Combat Tracker will only be showed for owned tokens.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_TOKEN_EFFECT_.Name: Show combatant effect tooltips
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_TOKEN_EFFECT_.Hint: When checked, combatants active effects in Combat Tracker will have a describing tooltip. If not all effects can be showed, a summary icon with a full list as tooltip replaces all effect icons.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_PLAYERS_PAN.Name: Enable pan to token for non-GMs
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_PLAYERS_PAN.Hint: When checked, players can click a combatant in Combat Tracker and the canvas will pan to its token.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_PLAYERS_CHA.Name: Enable change phase for non-GMs
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_PLAYERS_CHA.Hint: When checked, players can change phase in Combat Tracker for owned combatants

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_DEFAULT_PHASE_PLAY.Name: Default phase for players
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_DEFAULT_PHASE_PLAY.Hint: When adding a player token to combat, it will be added to this phase.(First phase is 0)

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_DEFAULT_PHASE_NPCS.Name: Default phase for NPCs
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_DEFAULT_PHASE_NPCS.Hint: When adding a NPC token to combat, it will be added to this phase.(First phase is 0)

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_ROUNDSET.Name: Enable round set
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_ROUNDSET.Hint: Enables custom defined round set for the combat tracker. Each round in the round set has its own phases.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_DEFINED_ROUNDSET.Name: Defined round set
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_DEFINED_ROUNDSET.Hint: Custom defined round set with rounds for the combat tracker. A string with a valid JSON expression.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_PHASES.Name: Enable phases
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_PHASES.Hint: Enables custom defined phases for the combat tracker. Each phase has its own initiative order. Adds dropdown menu items in the Combat Tracker that allows for changing the phase of a combatant token.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_DEFINED_PHASES.Name: Defined phases
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_DEFINED_PHASES.Hint: Custom defined phases for the combat tracker. A string with a valid JSON expression. Format example: {"phases":[{"name":"Magic","icon":"fa-sparkles"},{"name":"Missile","icon":"fa-bullseye"},{"name":"Melee","icon":"fa-swords"},{"name":"Manoeuvers","icon":"fa-person-walking"}]}

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_DISPOSITION.Name: Enable disposition change
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_DISPOSITION.Hint: Adds dropdown menu items in the Combat Tracker that allows for changing the disposition of a combatant token. Applies for GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_USE_ACTOR_PORTRAIT.Name: Use actor portraits for GMs
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_USE_ACTOR_PORTRAIT.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will use the token actors portrait as image instead of the token image. Applies for GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_USE_ACTOR_PORTRAIT.Name: Use actor portraits for players
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_USE_ACTOR_PORTRAIT.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will use the token actors portrait as image instead of the token image. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_DISPOSITION_F.Name: Show disposition for GMs
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_DISPOSITION_F.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will indicate by color the disposition of the combatant. Applies for GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_DISPOSITION_F.Name: Show disposition for players
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_DISPOSITION_F.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will indicate by color the disposition of the combatant. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_NAME_MASKIN.Name: Enable name masking
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_NAME_MASKIN.Hint: When checked, GMs can toggle masking the name of combatants for non-GMs in the Combat Tracker.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_VISIBILITY_.Name: Enable visibility toggle
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_VISIBILITY_.Hint: When checked, GMs can toggle visibility of the combatant token in the Combat Tracker.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ADD_COMBATANTS_NAM.Name: Add NPC combatants with name masked
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ADD_COMBATANTS_NAM.Hint: When checked, adding a NPC token to the Combat Tracker will have its name masked for non-GMs. Only used if[Enable name masking] is checked.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ADD_COMBATANTS_HID.Name: Add NPC combatants as hidden
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ADD_COMBATANTS_HID.Hint: When checked, adding a NPC token to the Combat Tracker will be added as hidden.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_OBSCURE_COMBATANT.Name: Enable obscure combatant
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_OBSCURE_COMBATANT.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will display combatants/information based on module settings and ownership. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_OBSCURE_COMBATANT_.Name: Obscure combatant by visibility
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_OBSCURE_COMBATANT_.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will only display combatants that has token visible for the user. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_OBSCURE_COMBATANT_.Name: Obscure combatant by disposition
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_OBSCURE_COMBATANT_.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will display combatants/information for tokens based on their disposition and current settings. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_REVERSE_INITIATIVE.Name: Reverse initiative
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_REVERSE_INITIATIVE.Hint: Reverse the sorting order for initiative so that lowest goes first.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_DUPLICATE_C.Name: Duplicate combatant
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_DUPLICATE_C.Hint: Add a 'Duplicate Combatant' dropdown menu item in the Combat Tracker that allows each token to have multiple combatants to give the possibility to get multiple actions in the same round.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_INITIATIVE_.Name: Initiative input field
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_INITIATIVE_.Hint: Replace the normal initiative value with a number input field.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_INITIATIVE_INPUT_M.Name: Minimum initiative input allowed
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_INITIATIVE_INPUT_M.Hint: The minimum number that can be entered into the initiative input field.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_INITIATIVE_INPUT_M.Name: Maximum initiative input allowed
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_INITIATIVE_INPUT_M.Hint: The maximum number that can be entered into the initiative input field.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_INITIATIVES_F.Name: Hide FRIENDLY combatants initiative
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_INITIATIVES_F.Hint: If checked, combatants with FRIENDLY token disposition will not show their initiative value in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_INITIATIVES_N.Name: Hide NEUTRAL combatants initiative
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_INITIATIVES_N.Hint: If checked, combatants with NEUTRAL token disposition will not show their initiative value in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_INITIATIVES_H.Name: Hide HOSTILE combatants initiative
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_INITIATIVES_H.Hint: If checked, combatants with HOSTILE token disposition will not show their initiative value in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_INITIATIVES_S.Name: Hide SECRET combatants initiative
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_INITIATIVES_S.Hint: If checked, combatants with SECRET token disposition will not show their initiative value in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_INITIATIVES_N.Name: Hide players combatants initiative
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_INITIATIVES_N.Hint: If checked, player combatants will not show their initiative value in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_COMBATANTS_FR.Name: Hide FRIENDLY combatants
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_COMBATANTS_FR.Hint: If checked, combatants with FRIENDLY token disposition will not be shown in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_COMBATANTS_NE.Name: Hide NEUTRAL combatants
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_COMBATANTS_NE.Hint: If checked, combatants with NEUTRAL token disposition will not be shown in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_COMBATANTS_HO.Name: Hide HOSTILE combatants
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_COMBATANTS_HO.Hint: If checked, combatants with HOSTILE token disposition will not be shown in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_COMBATANTS_SE.Name: Hide SECRET combatants
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_COMBATANTS_SE.Hint: If checked, combatants with SECRET token disposition will not be shown in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_COMBATANTS_NP.Name: Hide NPCs combatants
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_COMBATANTS_NP.Hint: If checked, NPC combatants will not be shown in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_COMBATANTS_NO.Name: Hide non-NPCs combatants
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_HIDE_COMBATANTS_NO.Hint: If checked, non-NPC combatants will not be shown in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.
